Title: Requires employers to provide a leave of absence for an employee to use for menopause
Summary: Requires employers to provide leave of absence of at least five days for every 12 month period for an employee to use for menopause symptoms; requires the commissioner of labor, in consultation with the commissioner of health, to develop workplace guidance relating to menopause.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to a period of paid leave for menopause
